text: قُلْ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًۢا بَصِيرًا

translation.en.sahih: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Cukuplah Allah menjadi saksi antara aku dan kamu sekalian. Sesungguhnya Dia adalah Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Melihat akan hamba-hamba-Nya".
